MxMotion.init|param|filter: [0-3] set the type of filter; eg: 0, 1
MxMotion.readAccel: read Motion accel data from sensor
MxMotion.readAccel|param|axis: [0-2] set the data of axis; eg: 0, 1
MxMotion.readEular: read Motion eular data from sensor
MxMotion.readEular|param|axis: [0-2] set the data of axis; eg: 0, 1
MxMotion.readGyro: read Motion gyro data from sensor
MxMotion.readGyro|param|axis: [0-2] set the data of axis; eg: 0, 1
